tool_description: Checks the current status of submitted FOIA requests using tracking numbers or reference information.

agency_name.description: Name of the agency handling the request

requester_email.description: Email address used in original request

error_messages: Tracking number not found: The provided tracking number is not recognized by the agency system.
Agency system unavailable: Unable to connect to agency tracking system. Try again later.
Access denied: Additional verification required to access request status.
usage: Provide the tracking_number and agency_name from your submitted request. Optionally include requester_email for verification. Returns current status and any available updates.

current_status.description: Current processing status of the request

pages_processed.description: Number of pages processed so far

pages_remaining.description: Number of pages still to be processed

additional_notes.description: Any additional status notes from the agency
